#SmartyMinify <FilesMatch "(js|css).gz[1-9]$"> <IfModule mod_headers.c> Header set Content-Encoding: gzip </IfModule> <FilesMatch "css.gz[1-9]$"> ForceType text/css </FilesMatch> <FilesMatch "js.gz[1-9]$"> ForceType text/javascript </FilesMatch> </FilesMatch>
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteRule ^cache/minify/(.+).gz([1-9])$ resize/gzip.php [L] #SmartyMinify #VQMOD#
